main event: A UFO was reported observing a circular array of lighted objects over Newport, Oregon, on September 10, 1967.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes., The objects appeared as bright lights arranged in a circular formation about 30 ft in diameter., The report mentions abrupt 90-degree turns that eliminated known aircraft., The observer was a school teacher described as reliable., The observation was made clear and with good visibility conditions.
sighted object: a circular array of lighted objects
witness description: a school teacher believed to be reliable
